TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SequentialStrategy extends NUnit.Framework.Builders.CombiningStrategy

Docs.summary: SequentialStrategy creates test cases by using all of the parameter data sources in parallel, substituting null when any of them run out of data.
